轙轙轙

Related Character(s): 钀
Связанный символ (и): 钀

轙字的基本解释

轙
yǐ
车衡上贯穿缰绳的大环：“龙輈华轙。”
整车待发。

轙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐ］
［《廣韻》魚倚切，上紙，疑。］
［《廣韻》魚羈切，平支，疑。］
亦作“钀2”。
(1)车衡上贯穿缰绳的大环。
(2)车。
(3)整车待发。

轙字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轙； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1249第14
【廣韻】魚倚切【集韻】【韻會】語綺切【正韻】養里切，?音螘。【說文】車衡載轡者。【爾雅·釋器】註：軛上環轡所貫也。　又【正韻】僕人嚴駕待發之意。【前漢·郊祀歌】靈禗禗，象輿轙。　【廣韻】【集韻】魚羈切【韻會】疑羈切【等韻】五羈切，?音宜。義同。或作?。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋器】軛上環轡所貫也。〕　謹照原書釋器下增註字。
轙字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
轙字的起名意思

暂无。

Xiao
Basic explanation of words
Xiao
yǐ
The big ring that runs through the reins on the weighing scale: "Long Qi Hua Zhi."
The vehicle is ready to go.
Xiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐ］
["Guangyun" fish leans on the cut, puts on the paper, suspicious. ]
["Guangyun" fish cut, flat branch, suspicious. ]
Also known as "钀2".
(1) The large loop that runs through the reins on the scale.
(2) Car.
(3) The whole vehicle is ready to go.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Che Zi Department] 　轙; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1249 14
[Guangyun] Fish Yiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yuqiqie [Zhengyun] Raises the inner cut, the sound ant. [Said the text] Those who carry the bridle on the car scale. [Erya·Release Device] Note: The upper ring of the yoke is also penetrated by the bridle.　[Zhengyun] The meaning of the servant is waiting to go. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Song] Ling Yu, like Yu Yu.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Fish Root Cut [Rhyme Meeting] Doubt Root Cut [Wait Rhyme] Five Root Cuts,? The sound is suitable. The same meaning. Or for?.
